name: rougin/codeigniter
description: Packaged "system" folder of the Codeigniter framework.

suggest.rougin/combustor: CRUD generator for the Codeigniter framework.
suggest.rougin/credo: Doctrine ORM integration for the Codeigniter framework.
suggest.rougin/ignite: Composer-based project for the Codeigniter framework.
suggest.rougin/wildfire: Query Builder wrapper for the Codeigniter framework.
